meanings.definition: Containing or impregnated with iron salts.
meanings.sent1: The chalybeate water had a strong metallic taste.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended drinking chalybeate water to increase iron levels.
meanings.sent3: The chalybeate stream turned the rocks rusty!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as chalybeate as the iron-rich water.
meanings.sent5: The chalybeate soil gave the plants a healthy boost.

meanings.definition: A mineral spring or well containing iron salts.
meanings.sent1: Visitors flocked to the chalybeate spring for its health benefits.
meanings.sent2: The locals believed in the healing properties of the chalybeate well.
meanings.sent3: The chalybeate spring was the town's hidden gem!
meanings.sent4: The chalybeate well was a fountain of vitality for the community.
meanings.sent5: The chalybeate mineral water was a popular attraction for tourists.
